definitions.definition: The quality of being provincial ; having provincial tastes, mentality, manners.
examples: The blacksmith's provincialism showed in his speech and manner

definitions.definition: A word or locution characteristic of a region or district.
Synonym of regionalism : belief in the superiority of one 's regional government ; the belief that most or nearly all political power should be decentralized to provincial governments .

main_definition: The quality of being provincial ; having provincial tastes, mentality, manners.
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics ) A word or locution characteristic of a region or district.
( politics ) Synonym of regionalism : belief in the superiority of one 's regional government ; the belief that most or nearly all political power should be decentralized to provincial governments .
